sql.name: SQL_INSERT_LOGISTICS_ORDER
sql.value: insert into logistics_order(destination_actor, destination_address, create_date, ecommerce, status, ecommerce_order_id) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

sql.name: SQL_SELECT_ORDER_DETAIL
sql.value: select t1.order_id logistics_order_id, t1.create_date l_create_date, t1.status l_status,t1.fee l_fee, t2.real_name d_actor_name, t2.cell_phone d_actor_cellphone, t2.customer_id d_customer_id, t3.real_name o_actor_name, t3.cell_phone o_actor_cellphone, t3.customer_id o_actor_id, t4.province d_province, t4.city d_city, t4.district d_district, t4.county d_county, t4.detail d_detail, t4.zip_code d_zip_code, t4.company d_company, t5.province o_province, t5.city o_city, t5.district o_district, t5.county o_county, t5.detail o_detail, t5.zip_code o_zip_code, t5.company o_company, t6.comment, t6.commodities, t6.status e_status,t7.company_name e_company t7.contact e_contact, t8.company_name l_company, t8.contact l_contact from logistics_order t1 left join actor t2 on t1.destination_actor = t2.actor_id left join actor t3 on t1.origin_actor = t3.actor_id left join address t4 on t1.destination_address = t4.address_id left join address t5 on t1.origin_address = t5.address_id left join ecommerce_order t6 on t1.ecommerce_order_id t6.id left join company t7 on t1.ecommerce t7.company_id left join company t8 on t1.logistics = t8.company_id where t1.order_id = ?

sql.name: SQL_UPDATE_ORDER_STATUS
sql.value: update logistics_order set status = ? where order_id = ?
